SELECT s.MAT_LOT_CODE , h.INOUT_DATE , h.INOUT_CNT FROM MAT_DETAIL S JOIN MAT_INOUT_HISTORY H ON S.MAT_LOT_CODE = H.MAT_LOT_CODE
s.qlty_check_status = '미검사'
AND s.MAT_LOT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{matLotCode}||'%'
AND trunc(h.INOUT_DATE) = to_Date(#{inoutDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND h.inout_sep = 'IN'
ORDER BY 1
